function.name: chart__create_line_chart
function.description: Chart Tool: Display a line chart of the data

data.description: The data to display in the chart. In the format of an array of arrays [key, value]

function.name: chart__create_column_chart
function.description: Chart Tool: Display a columns chart of the data

data.description: The data to display in the chart. In the format of an array of hashes, each hash: {name: <serie_name>, data: [[<value_label_1>, <data_1>], ...] }
